description: This file defines a JavaScript module providing an API client for contacts management, including functions to list contact lists, get details of a specific list, and upload contacts via CSV.

methods.name: listContactLists(params = {})
methods.description: Fetches all contact lists, with optional filtering or pagination.

methods.name: getContactListDetails(listId)
methods.description: Fetches details for a specific contact list, including contacts.

methods.name: uploadContactsCsv({ file, listName, delimiter = ',', hasHeader = true })
methods.description: Uploads a CSV file to create or update a contact list, with customizable delimiter and header presence.

ctags.name: uploadContactsCsv
ctags.pattern: /^export async function uploadContactsCsv({ file, listName, delimiter = ',', hasHeader = true }) {$/
